67e3e54a-52df-42f0-ad2d-f43bd220660d.name: Directional
67e3e54a-52df-42f0-ad2d-f43bd220660d.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

d51d227a-3d08-4ab3-ab7c-0a6adea4e859.name: Tough Skin
d51d227a-3d08-4ab3-ab7c-0a6adea4e859.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

dc78e0c1-c17a-4bc4-853f-86bde351d789.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

735db6ba-65bc-474e-82b3-e82ad95426b3.name: Oxygen Storage
735db6ba-65bc-474e-82b3-e82ad95426b3.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

07bb8bc1-2e68-41c6-a128-4f93ec420082.name: Oxygen Storage
07bb8bc1-2e68-41c6-a128-4f93ec420082.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

49930c7f-7304-4d23-9b4c-ec3b6355a68e.name: Oxygen Storage
49930c7f-7304-4d23-9b4c-ec3b6355a68e.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

c2be7be7-8d66-4e3c-a687-e9b8144bfeb6.name: Oxygen Storage
c2be7be7-8d66-4e3c-a687-e9b8144bfeb6.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

60746010-6e8c-4025-83f4-0ad71c8961ca.name: Oxygen Storage
60746010-6e8c-4025-83f4-0ad71c8961ca.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

3d0c7ab4-e68d-41af-81fb-73272684df1a.name: Diffuse
3d0c7ab4-e68d-41af-81fb-73272684df1a.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

16a73d11-12b2-47df-9ab2-6364567a5e7f.name: Homogenous
16a73d11-12b2-47df-9ab2-6364567a5e7f.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

78e22c6b-9de7-49c3-b344-051936ecc085.name: No Blood
78e22c6b-9de7-49c3-b344-051936ecc085.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

1a9e5010-d25a-460d-b229-89d6654646b1.name: No Brain
1a9e5010-d25a-460d-b229-89d6654646b1.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

fcd89de9-bd5d-48fc-af26-065a53c0e935.name: No Eyes
fcd89de9-bd5d-48fc-af26-065a53c0e935.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

c6694a8b-b67c-4924-b56f-b23606096efb.name: No Head
c6694a8b-b67c-4924-b56f-b23606096efb.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

6ea2cf83-30cc-42ad-bed0-e9ca25034f98.name: No Neck
6ea2cf83-30cc-42ad-bed0-e9ca25034f98.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

7312d1dc-3219-4b3c-8cef-c52e480a0ef6.name: No Vitals
7312d1dc-3219-4b3c-8cef-c52e480a0ef6.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

e6b8c954-971e-4f23-b6f2-8bf802fcb4eb.name: Unliving
e6b8c954-971e-4f23-b6f2-8bf802fcb4eb.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
